wlv.mt.tools
Class FileModel

java.lang.Object
  wlv.mt.tools.FileModel

public class FileModel
extends java.lang.Object

A FileModel contains information about the input text: the words contained and their frequency in the reference corpus It registers 2 resources: "words" and "freq", required by BB features 20-29

Author:
Catalina Hallett
